sys_script.name: Create outbound-cancelled transaction
sys_script.script: (function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { new TransactionHandler().createOutboundTransaction(current, '13706ec31b8ef95036211138b04bcb12');})(current, previous);
